dash-info: Displays real-time statistical information of the app.
front-dash-info: Displays the basic status information of the monitored website as of today.

desc.logmeter: Displays the status of log data for analysis collected in real time.
desc.pageview: Analyzes errors and crashes for each page of the app
desc.resourceusage: Analyze the device's resource usages in order of frequency of use.
desc.devicedistribution: Analyze error and crash distribution based on user device.
desc.accessibility: Analyze the user accessibility and usability of the app
desc.favorites: Analyze usability and performance for each major page.
desc.pvequalizer: Analyze the usability of the app for each page view.
desc.loadingtimescatter: Compare and analyze real-time loading time.
desc.responsetimescatter: Compare and analyze real-time response time.
desc.responsetimeline: Response time is controlled in real time based on Logmeter.
desc.loadingtimeline: Loading time is controlled in real time based on Logmeter.
desc.areadistribution: Analyze app performance distribution by region based on today statistics.
desc.versioncomparison: Compare and analyze key monitoring items for each OS version based on previous day statistics.
desc.crashesbyversion: The part where the crash occurred is useful.
desc.warning: View the list of warnings accumulated today.
desc.versionconversion: Statistics and index usage rates for each OS and app version.
desc.marketinginsight: Set the Start URL and the Reach URL to analyze the behavior patterns of the user.
desc.frontloadingtimescatter: Analyzes page performance over the last 5 minutes.
desc.frontresponsetimescatter: Analyzes Ajax performance over the last 5 minutes.
desc.fronterrorcount: Visualizes the error count from the last 5 minutes.
desc.frontareadistribution: Analyzes regional app performance distribution based on todayâ€™s statistics.
desc.frontpageloadingcount: Visualizes the page count from the last 5 minutes.
desc.frontresponsecount: Visualizes the Ajax count from the last 5 minutes.
desc.frontlivesessionview: Visualizes current connection session in real time.

msg.noerrorNcrash: Error and crash are viewable when they selected.
msg.errorNcrashPopup: It opens when there is an Error or Crash value.
msg.rangeSelection: Today's date cannot be selected when selecting a range.
msg.noSetMarketingInsight: Marketing Insight URL is not set.
msg.noSetVersionComparison: Version Comparison target OS and version are not set.
msg.noapp: The app has not been registered.
msg.appReg: Please register the app in the app settings.
msg.createError: An error occurred while creating the dashboard component.

waterfall.webVitalDesc: Event Timings and Core Web Vitals
waterfall.vitalLcpDesc: Measures loading performance. To provide a good user experience, LCP should occur within 2.5 seconds of when the page first starts loading.
waterfall.vitalClsDesc: Measures visual stability. To provide a good user experience, pages should maintain a CLS of 0.1. or less.
waterfall.vitalInpDesc: Measures interactivity. To provide a good user experience, pages should have a INP of 200 milliseconds or less.
waterfall.domInteractiveDesc: The point when the HTML document has been fully parsed and the DOM is fully built.
waterfall.dclDesc: The event that fires when the HTML has been fully parsed, excluding the loading of external resources like images and CSS.
waterfall.fcpDesc: The time when the browser renders the first content such as text, images, or canvas.
waterfall.loadTimeDesc: The total loading time of the page, including the document and all resources.
waterfall.fidDesc: The delay between a user's first interaction (click, tap, etc.) and the time when the event handler starts running.
waterfall.ttfbDesc: The time from when the browser makes a request to when it receives the first byte of the response.
waterfall.tbtDesc: The total time the main thread was blocked for more than 50ms between FCP and Time to Interactive.
waterfall.lcpDesc: The point when the largest content element within the viewport is fully rendered.
